name: Demon Bell
description: Energy Outburst: When the hero releases active skill, have a 100% chance to increase all allies 20 energy and a 50% chance to increase an extra 10 energy.

description: Blessing of the Wild: When a round ends, increase all damage dealt by the hero by 9%.Blessing of the Wild: When a round ends, increase all damage dealt by the hero by 9%.

description: God's Power: When the hero Crits, deal extra damage by 25% of the target's max HP. (Damage caps at 2500% of the hero's Attack.)

name: Magic Stone Sword
description: Soul Guardian: Offsets (not exceeding 100% of the wearer's HP) the damage received, capping the single damage received at 20% of the wearer's max HP. (Not applied to damages from Healing Charm and Monsters.)

name: Augustus Magic Ball
description: Enchanted Shield: Reduces the damage received by 250% of the hero's Attack.(Invalid to damage from Healing Charm and Monsters.)

name: The Kiss of Ghost
description: Bloody Plunder: When the hero releases active skill or basic attacks, restore self HP by 90% of damage dealt. (Invalid to DOT.)

name: Lucky Candy Bar
description: Control of Destiny: When the battle starts, offset the first Control effect received and grant immunity to this Control effect during the battle. When the hero is controlled, get self Hand of Fate for 1 round. When a round ends, if the hero is controlled, get self Hand of Fate for 1 round. (Hand of Fate: increases self 30% of All-damage Reduction. Not stackable.)

name: Wildfire Torch
description: Shielding Flame: Converts 80% of damage from active skills or basic attacks into DoT, each time receiving damage by 20% of the converted damage, lasting for 4 rounds. (The converted DoT won't be affected by any effects.)

name: Golden Crown
description: Deterrence of Majesty: When the battle starts, increase the hero 50% of All-damage Reduce which will decrease by 10% each round.

name: Ruyi Scepter
description: Eye of Insights: Offsets the target 30% of Control Immune.

name: Snow Heart
description: Piercing Frost: At the beginning of the battle and the end of each round, there is a 100%, 66% and 33% chance to inflict Frost respectively on the 3 enemies with the highest Speed for 1 round(s) (Frost: Skill effect. Reduces the target's Speed by 60.)

name: Melodic Strings
description: Valiant Music: At the beginning of each battle, increases self All Damage Dealt by 50%. It reduces by 10% per round, down to a minimum of 20%.
